attributes.review: I downloaded to see any reasons to vote for Trump. They asked for personal information, such as my phone number, which was very suspicious but I ignored it. A few days later, a man arrives at my house fully dressed in confederate flags and smelled of sweaty socks dipped in hot dog water. He then pushed me, pooped in my mouth, made me chew it and spit it at my poor grandma who was trying to take a nap, and stole my dog while yelling "ALL LIVES MATTER, TRUMP 2020" and called me many slurs that I can't name. Please do NOT download this app. I have now started virtual therapy and my grandma refuses to look me in the eye.
